contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.newslet.EmailPreviewText: Check out the latest news 📰 from the Kentico community!
contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.newslet.EmailSubject: Xperience by Kentico July Refresh, agentic AI experiences, and community contributions
contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.newslet.NewsletterEmailIntroContentHTML:
Hey {!ResolveDynamicText("Recipient.FirstName","friend")!},

Xperience by Kentico's July 2025 Refresh is here with production-ready digital commerce, workflow notifications, and SaaS deployment speedups. We also have a couple of blog posts about our adoption of agentic AI for software development at Kentico.

The Kentico community has shared many contributions with us that we're passing on to you! They cover a variety of topics including Xperience features like headless channels, the Content hub, and setting up a new Xperience project, along with perspectives on AI, and an open-source cache integration.

Are you attending in-person events or conferences these days? Let us know if you've seen things change over the past few years and what you think trends are for the future in the Q&A discussion linked below.
contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.newslet.NewsletterEmailOutroContentHTML: Did you find the information in this newsletter helpful, does something looks strange in your email client, or do you have news, a video, or blog post to feature in a future newsletter - let us know by giving us some feedback.
